Package org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc

Interface Summary
BotConstants Interface for all bot constants (bot constants are constants that are not IRC response codes)
IRCConstants Represents all IRC reply codes Thanks SO MUCH to the people in #Perl for the script that helped me do this! I probably would have had to have spent a day on this :p.
IRCEventListener The interface for receiving IRC events.
 

Class Summary
BotUtils Utility methods used a lot in the bot and not really tied to a certain class.
EventArgs Wrapper class for arguments to Snipes events.
ExampleBot  
IRCBase Main class for the Snipes IRC framework.
SnipesSocketFactory The default socket factory for all IRC operations within the bot.
SnipesSSLSocketFactory The default socket factory for all secure IRC operations within the bot.
 

Enum Summary
Event  
 

Exception Summary
NotConnectedException A exception thrown when a operation is attempted that would require connection to a IRC server, and we are not connected.
